fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Sport, Communication
eu_initiatives: transparency in sport; Freedom ofmedia; common foreign Policy and neighbourhood policy
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Association, Sport Culture Media & Diplomacy is a non profit organization which aims to create a world of peace through sport and culture. We develop several activities such as sports tournaments among diplomats, cultural events, high level panel meetings to discuss the future of sport and culture.
